long_description: The REI Quantum shoulder bag accommodates small laptops in a vertical messenger bag design. It provides convenience, protection, organization and comfort for commuters, students and professionals. Pads up to a 14 in. laptop, cellphone and electronics to prevent bumps and bruises; fold-open laptop compartment speeds TSA security screening. Main compartment fits letter-size documents and file folders. Mesh side pocket expands to varying sizes and fits a water bottle; padded zip side pocket keeps small belongings protected and accessible. Rugged recycled-PET fabric keeps 28 16-oz. plastic bottles out of landfills. Durable nylon bottom panel and foam padding protect contents; shoulder strap adjusts for cross-body carriage. Increase visibility with the reflective trim; a centrally located clip loop holds an LED safety light, sold separately. REI Quantum shoulder bag also has a convenient carry handle.
short_description: The REI Quantum shoulder bag accommodates small laptops in a vertical messenger bag design. It provides convenience, protection, organization and comfort for commuters, students and professionals.
